agenda.description: ** REVISION ** HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Culture, Recreation & Tourism TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Wednesday, May 1, 2019 PLACE: E1.010 CHAIR: Rep. John Cyrier HB 3730 Swanson | et al. Relating to the purchase of online library resources for primary and secondary schools by the Texas State Library and Archives Commission. HCR 86 Springer Designating the Bowie knife as the official state knife of Texas. SB 1511 Nichols | et al. Relating to the operation of the Battleship "Texas." SB 810 Perry | et al. Relating to the identification of breeder deer. *Testimony may be limited to 3 minutes per witness. Bill order is at the discretion of the chair.* Bills added after last posting: HCR 86 ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions ** of the schedule, if applicable. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
